long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Persistent local storage for each URL visit. Keep your browsing history forever. A digital journal for your browsing history. Chrome only maintains browser history for a few months. History Hoard lets you store each URL and each visit of said URL on your device forever.
Open-Source Software.
All data is stored locally.
No data is transmitted to History Hoard.
